data.description: Mapping of XML entities to Unicode
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
It's just like HTML::Entities only it doesn't limit itself to those
    defined for HTML, hence the choice of the namespace. The module
    should be listed in the list because it provides an interface to a
    standard (a bunch of ISO standards actually) and some folks can
    hopefully use it.
